summary: Repopulate Skyrim with the People of House Cats ...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]Repopulate Skyrim with the People of House Cats[/size][/b][/color] No DLC needed

[b][i]Place cats wherever you want through Skyrim ...[/i][/b]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/MGhDGl8.gif[/img]

10 variants colors (Dark Grey, Dark Brown, Ginger, Spotted, White, Black, Brown, Light Brown, Grey, Light Grey) + Black and White (Sabrecat animation) + Statue (Skeever animation) !


4 Cats are following you (Brown, Light Brown, Grey, Light Grey)

8 Cats stay at the chosen place (Dark Grey, Dark Brown, Ginger, Spotted, White, Black, Black and White, Statue)

Place a cat statue ... The "cat" is walking !! ... Kill him ! … It's a statue !


[i]These cats do not meow constantly, just a very quiet purr ![/i]


[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française[/color]


[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18013103494916616015524534.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/31//18013103494916616015524534.jpg[/img][/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/K7wS1yL.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b] HORDES of House Cats [/b][/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly create hordes of creatures (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these cats, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in Whiterun: [color=#00ff00][i][b]Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare [/b][/i][/color] Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into creatures.

In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/xurvEbo.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000] Credits[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Mihail Romanov[/color] for the House Cat in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88386/?] House Cats- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - pets- witcher) [/url] (Also [color=#00ff00] CD PROJEKT RED[/color] for the Witcher and [color=#00ff00] LorSakyamuni[/color] to convert the cat)

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/31991110/?] PanPi [/url]for the 4 new textures (Dark Brown, Spotted, Ginger, White)

[color=#ff0000]LorSakyamuni [/color] for the « Statues » of the cats in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76524/?] The Witcher 3 Monsters and Animals Resource Pack [/url] (“You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”,“Pack containing a lot of monsters and animals included in the game The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. All the original assets belong to [url=http://en.cdprojektred.com/] CD PROJEKT RED [/url] and are distributed with their permission. Feel free to use them, just remember to credit me.”)

[color=#ff0000]HISSSSA[/color] for the Mesh/texture of the Black and White cat in his mod

[url=http://ux.getuploader.com/issssaxmod002/download/3/HS-Cat+Base+for+Skyrim+0.2.7z]hs-cat[/url]

[url=http://hissssa.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/]Blog of Hissssa [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Testiger2 and XP32[/color] for the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/? ]Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix [/url] ("Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder -testiger2-")

[img]https://i.imgur.com/6xvvhTh.gif[/img]

[size=4][color=#ff0000]Mod 2[/color][/size] in this video from 1'10'' to 2'25''

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]dReQalpF_j4[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
